Reviews.Title: “Pleasant staff, nice location, very calm, some inconvieniences though”
Reviews.Author: sanspe14
Reviews.Content: staff pleasant helpful location nice 2 minutes walk donjon de vincennes castle nice hotel calm street hear automobile ground creaks little bit hear neighbours variety food breakfast basic stuff lift middle stairs heavy suitcase prepared lift couple stairs electrical appliances difficult reach

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: artzart
Reviews.Content: organized painting vacation 10 artist friends stayed hotel du donjon eight nights cant staff facilities location atmosphere awesome staff stay unforgettable helpful giving directions daily visits paris metro getting information nice beds comfortable convenient visiting sites paris short 12 metro trip center paris vincennes discover actual dungeon ruins chateau de vincennes local restaurants shops husband lived france kept address hotel address book 30 stayed ago highly recommend
